9c3d8426553bcb733ec37788a77af4d5 (19:06): Brandano: jupp

4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:08): search the page for "Loft/Bridge/Skin"

9c3d8426553bcb733ec37788a77af4d5 (19:12): Brandano: how can it be used with blender
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:13): The_ManU: you have a Win32 install, right? wil all default options?
9c3d8426553bcb733ec37788a77af4d5 (19:13): Brandano: linux
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:14): In the Blender folder there should be a .blender/scripts folder
9c3d8426553bcb733ec37788a77af4d5 (19:14): Brandano: does not work that well on organic shapes.
9c3d8426553bcb733ec37788a77af4d5 (19:14): is mentioned there
9c3d8426553bcb733ec37788a77af4d5 (19:14): Brandano: ok and how to open it in blender?
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:14): I know. You'd better subsurf hem afterwards
9c3d8426553bcb733ec37788a77af4d5 (19:15): Brandano: ok subsurfing is one of my last actions
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:15): in the config panel there's a python path option, with a small button beside it
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:15): that button re-reads the script folder and refreshes the menus
9c3d8426553bcb733ec37788a77af4d5 (19:16): Brandano: ok (restart of blender would be the same?)and how to use the script?
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:16): yep, restart would be the same. I have never used that script, so I know as much as you
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:17): but there should be some little doc with it
3f4387e15113f958fd3b902686d2dc00 (19:24): ah low poly stuff is so fun
9c3d8426553bcb733ec37788a77af4d5 (19:25): nope Brandano
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:25): Not even in the file itself?
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:26): it's a text file after all
9c3d8426553bcb733ec37788a77af4d5 (19:29): Brandano: ah ok but there is only mentioned what it does but how to make the script working where will it be shown in blender?
9c3d8426553bcb733ec37788a77af4d5 (19:29): dont know which button to press
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:29): probably it has a GUI
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:29): save your scene, open a new one and play with it a bit
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:30): judging by the screenshots it bridges between selected surfaces
9c3d8426553bcb733ec37788a77af4d5 (19:43): Brandano: i cant play with it when i not know ehere to find it in blender or how to open
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (19:44): probably in the scripts panel, in the mesh section. Read the menu registration in the script
